title: Rudimental - Slab Serif font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829105804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rudi_5227.jpg)

Any idea which font this is?

Many thanks
author: Gavlar

comments.content:
It must be **[Ziggurat HTF Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829105804/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Ziggurat%20HTF-Black%20-%20Regular&fid=414aa52750dc9898f8ec29e9017617fd&fsize=60&text=RUDIMENTAL&fit=1)** by Hoefler & Frere Jones (1991)  
Very close also to **[Giza Seven Five](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829105804/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=Giza%20SevenFive%20-%20Regular&fid=aa112c8f4b2c4bafc97896e96b58cf1b&fsize=60&text=RUDIMENTAL&fit=1)** by Font Bureau, but Ziggurat looks like a better match
